label.en: 25/26 S block mode part 2 3 CP HV

description.en: Critical examination of theologies of nature and environmental ethics from Christian perspective.
description.et: Loodusteoloogiate ja keskkonnaeetika kriitiline käsitlus kristlikust perspektiivist.

objectives.en: To relate various theological, philosophical, ethical, psychological et al. understandings with our idea and experience of nature.
objectives.et: Seostada erinevaid teoloogilisi, filosoofilisi, eetilisi, psühholoogilisi jm arusaamu meie kogemuse ja ideega loodusest.

learning_outcomes.en:
Student will notice how our theological, philosophical et al. concepts and related to our idea of nature.
Student will articulate the problematic aspects in different interpretations of nature.
Learns to discuss how human being belongs to nature and what can be inferred of our experience of being fully natural for our theological interpretations.
Learns from experience the basics of transdisciplinary research.
